items.sentence: How can I make sure that this won\'t happen to me or my parents?
I want to go to Australia once again before my passport expires.
I was just wondering if Tom could possibly be in love with Mary.
I wish I could figure out how to stop my children from fighting.
I wish that I had stuck around long enough to meet your parents.
Tom told Mary that he wasn\'t the captain of the wrestling team.
Some people don\'t go to a doctor because they can\'t afford to.
I didn\'t know Tom\'s parents let him stay out late on weekends.
I don\'t understand why you don\'t want to go to Boston with us.
The weather forecast says we\'re in for heavy rain this evening.
